Constructors.Summary: Initializes a new instance of Axis class

Properties.Name: Model
Properties.Summary: Gets the Model of the axis, the model is used a DTO to communicate with the core of the library.

Properties.Name: Labels
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets axis labels, labels property stores the array to map for each index and value, for example if axis value is 0 then label will be labels[0], when value 1 then labels[1], value 2 then labels[2], ..., value n labels[n], use this property instead of a formatter when there is no conversion between value and label for example names, if you are plotting sales vs salesman name.

Properties.Name: Sections
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets the axis sectionsCollection, a section is useful to highlight ranges or values in a chart.

Properties.Name: LabelFormatter
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets the function to convert a value to label, for example when you need to display your chart as currency ($1.00) or as degrees (10Â°), if Labels property is not null then formatter is ignored, and label will be pulled from Labels prop.

Properties.Name: Separator
Properties.Summary: Get or sets configuration for parallel lines to axis.

Properties.Name: Stroke
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets axis color, axis means only the zero value, if you need to highlight where zero is. to change separators color, see Axis.Separator

Properties.Name: StrokeThickness
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets axis thickness.

Properties.Name: ShowLabels
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets if labels are shown in the axis.

Properties.Name: MaxValue
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets axis max value, set it to null to make this property Auto, default value is null

Properties.Name: MinValue
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets axis min value, set it to null to make this property Auto, default value is null

Properties.Name: Title
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets axis title, the title will be displayed only if this property is not null, default is null.

Properties.Name: Position
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets the axis position, default is Axis.Position.LeftBottom, when the axis is at Y and Position is LeftBottom, then axis will be placed at left, RightTop position will place it at Right, when the axis is at X and position LeftBottom, the axis will be placed at bottom, if position is RightTop then it will be placed at top.

Properties.Name: IsMerged
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets if the axis labels should me placed inside the chart, this is useful to save some space.

Properties.Name: DisableAnimations
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets if the axis is animated.

Properties.Name: FontFamily
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets labels font family, font to use for any label in this axis

Properties.Name: FontSize
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets labels font size

Properties.Name: FontWeight
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets labels font weight

Properties.Name: FontStyle
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets labels font style

Properties.Name: FontStretch
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets labels font stretch

Properties.Name: Foreground
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets labels text color.

Properties.Name: LabelsRotation
Properties.Summary: Gets or sets the labels rotation in the axis, the angle starts as a horizontal line, you can use any angle in degrees, even negatives.
